briefTitle: Darbepoetin Alfa in Patients With Anemic Low or Intermediate-1 Risk Myelodysplastic Syndrome (MDS)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of Darbepoetin Alfa for the Treatment of Anaemic Subjects With Low or Intermediate-1 Risk Myelodysplastic Syndrome (MDS)
summary: The primary objective was to assess the superiority of darbepoetin alfa versus placebo on the incidence of red blood cell transfusions during the 24-week double-blind treatment period in anemic patients with low or intermediate-1 risk MDS.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With at Least One Red Blood Cell (RBC) Transfusion During the Double-blind Treatment Period
